entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 03 March 2023
